name: VR House Level Prototype
description:
Prototype made in the unity course "VR Development" where I develop the basic mechanics in virtual reality:

- Locomotion, teleportation, grabbable objects, sockets, audio and haptics, direct and ray interactors, user interface, accessibility, optimization, lighting

You can download the .apk and try it on your oculus quest. Please, I would appreciate any kind of feedback. Thanks
